reapack.name: DoomSquirrel_Open item in midi editor with default zoom level.lua
reapack.desc: DoomSquirrel_Open item in MIDI Editor with default zoom level

reapack.name: DoomSquirrel_Randomize CC values for notes in last clicked lane.lua
reapack.desc: DoomSquirrel_Randomize CC values for notes in last clicked lane

metadata.link: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tuomiorava/REAPER-ReaScripts/master/DEMO/DEMO_DoomSquirrel_Randomize CC values for notes in last clicked lane.gif

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Customizable rocord monitoring mode (RECMON_ACTIVE) Allow Performance Arming when project has only one track

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Scroll track into view (customizable with the *_SCROLL_TRACK_TO_VIEW & *_ALWAYS_SCROLL_TO_* User Settings)

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Combined the 2 scripts "(sequential)" & "(sequential name)" Checking if track has instrument(s) is optional now Checking if track name contains TRACK_NAME_Q is optional now

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Better Scrolling (options to scroll track to view or scroll track to top in TCP / left in MCP)

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Better operating behaviour. Now, first seeks the track to Performance Arm. If it is found, un-Performance Arms all tracks, and afterwards Performance Arms the found track. Also, toggles the Performance Armed state of a track when operating on the same one multiple times.

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Stop iterating for tracks to Performance Arm when the first match is found Code cleanup

reapack.name: DoomSquirrel_Performance Arm track for MIDI (under mouse).lua
reapack.desc: DoomSquirrel_Performance Arm track for MIDI (under mouse)

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Scroll track into view (customizable with the *_SCROLL_TRACK_TO_VIEW & *_ALWAYS_SCROLL_TO_* User Settings)

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Better Scrolling (options to scroll track to view or scroll track to top in TCP / left in MCP)

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Better operating behaviour. Now, first seeks the track to Performance Arm. If it is found, un-Performance Arms all tracks, and afterwards Performance Arms the found track. Also, toggles the Performance Armed state of a track when operating on the same one multiple times.

version.author: DoomSquirrel
version.changelog: Now uses command: 40110 (Action: "View: Toggle track zoom to minimum height") for zooming out.

reapack.name: DoomSquirrel_Toggle mute between selected tracks & track under mouse.lua
reapack.desc: DoomSquirrel_Toggle mute between selected tracks & track under mouse
